Name: Beat The Clock
About the game: You were accused and found guilty of temporal crimes, crimes against time that you did not commit. Sentenced to 10,000 millennia in the cells of Chronos, the thought of impending madness weighed heavily on you. But, perhaps there's a glimmer of hope. Those foolish Chronosians didn't find your trusty stopwatch. Armed with your timepiece, there may be a way out of here... BREAK FREE Stop the stopwatch at exactly 1 second, earn gold and find freedom. But be warned, time is not something to be played with lightly. UPGRADE, UPGRADE, UPGRADE With thousands of upgrades, you'll earn your freedom in no time. PROVE YOUR WORTH Prove your worth and earn badges by completing 20 difficult challenges.
Meta Title: Beat The Clock: May 31, 2022, LonelyOcelot and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Beat The Clock? Check out the release date (May 31, 2022), developer insights from LonelyOcelot, and a complete game summary.
